name: Scallywag Showdown
description:
Scallywag Showdown is a 2-4 player party game where each player must shoot each other off the ship wreck, however, the more rounds you play the more the odds may stack against you. Ghosts of dead players can still haunt and push you off the ship wreck and other players can give you debuffs through special cannon balls.

This project is a prototype made by a group of 2nd year students studying Bachelor of Software Engineering and Bachelor of Creative Technologies under Media Design School, New Zealand.

This prototype is the second we've done as a group. If you're interested in looking at our previous prototype before Scallywag Showdown Click Here. For each prototype we're only given 1 week to create so bugs, errors and issues are inevitable.

All players need a controller in order to play the game. Mouse is used to Navigate Through The Main Menu!

CONTROLLER CONTROLS
   -  Right Joystick To Aim
   -  Left Joystick To Move
   -  Right Bumper To Shoot
   -  Left Bumper To Use Special Cannon Ability
   -  A Button To Jump or Join The Game
   -  A. B. X. and Y Button To Pick Buff/Debuffs
   -  Start Button To Pause In Lobby or Mid-Game
